description.value: The Range of the Warp Disruption Talent is doubled from Willpower Bonus to 2x Willpower Bonus metres.

system.benefit: The Range of the Warp Disruption Talent is doubled from Willpower Bonus to 2x Willpower Bonus metres.

prerequisites.text: Tier 3: Untouchable E.Adv, Warp Disruption, Willpower 55.
